Text.Value: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
Why were you at the inn?
Where were you trying to take the Duke?
What were you trying to retrieve?
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Synopsis: The Cult of the Absolute has ransacked the inn at Waukeen's Rest and kidnapped Duke Stelmane of Baldur's Gate. The player arrives after the carnage, finding corpses strewn about. The player casts 'Speak with Dead' on one of these corpses - one of the drow raiders. He was killed by a Flaming Fist archer perched atop the inn.
